column1: Do not add/remove any rows to the header as this will cause an error in the import of this file

column2: Output Subject ID (Can be left empty: defaults to MEGHash or First string preceeding and underscore)
Input MEG folder with the data runs (Typically  starts with a date)
If coregistration through Afni: full path to brik file
If coregistration through brainsight: the nifti imported into brainsight (must also include electrodes text file)
If coregistration through brainsight: text file from brainsight electrodes export)
Defaults to 1: if another session change
